赥字的基本解释

赥
xī
赤。
古同“嘻”，笑的声音：“这大圣忍不住，赥赥的笑出声来。”

赥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》許激切，入錫，曉。］
(1)笑声。
(2)引申为笑。

赥字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【赤字部】　赥； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1213第28
【廣韻】許激切【集韻】【韻會】馨激切【正韻】迄逆切，?音鬩。赥赥，笑聲。【元包經】言侃侃，笑赥赥。　又【玉篇】赤也。

赥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
赥字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
赥
xī
red.
Gu Tong "hee", laughing voice: "This great sage couldn't help but laugh out politely."
赥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" Xu Jiqie, enter the tin, Xiao. ]
(1) Laughter.
(2) The extension is laughter.

[Unitary Collection] [Deficit Department] 　赥; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 1213 28
[Guang Yun] Xu Jiqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme Club] Xin Jiqie [Positive Rhyme] until the reverse cut, the sound? Poor, laughter. [Yuan Bao Jing] Talk and talk, laugh and laugh.　[Jade Chapter] Red also.
